column5: Dang Tj that sure looks good now how many hours of turning the bird did that take and when we should show up?
LOL.. ya  a burning ban. whatever.. and ive got hot turkey sandwiches tomorrow.. my place noon.. ya get here .. ill feed ya1....
Oh ya...  takes 4-6 hours.. depend in on how cold the bird is when ya start and how hot the fire/wind is...  It a great way to force yourself to take a day off.

Man, if we did something like that around here, P3TA, the fuzz, the by law girl, and the local chapter of witches would pounce on us,  but it sure looks tasty.  I might have to try that with a chicken at the campground this summer.
how can you make it keep turning around?
Looks awesome as usual TJ.  I recall watching your video of this last year of the year before. You should post that again. It had great detail on how you did it.  Cheers, Ron...
Monique is on a ladder with a drill!
Looks good! Probably a lot safer and healthier than deep frying a whole bird.
